revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SkullAttack}} {{doomwiki|A_SkullAttack}} '''A_SkullAttack''' [(int ''speed'')]
The attack of Doom's [[Classes:LostSoul|lost soul]]. The calling actor charges at its current target. The ''speed'' parameter defines the speed of the charge (20 by default).
== Examples == This example is taken straight from Doom's Lost Soul.
Missile: SKUL C 10 bright [[A_FaceTarget]] SKUL D 4 bright [[A_SkullAttack]] SKUL CD 4 bright goto Missile+2
[[category:Decorate Classic attack functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:SkullAttack}}
